node.title: The shock Tim Paine scandal that was four years in the making
node.description: Cricket fans were taken aback when news of Tim Paine's indiscretions and resignation broke, but Cricket Australia probably wasn't — and that is much of the problem, Dean Bilton writes.
node.content:
["For cricket fans, the news came disarmingly out of the blue.", "Still safely in the sleepy preparation stage before the men's cricket summer properly began, there was about half an hour of warning that the landscape of the game in Australia was about to be seismically shifted yet again.", "At the same time as a story was published detailing a series of text messages Australian Test captain Tim Paine had sent a female Cricket Tasmania employee in 2017, an impromptu press conference was called.", "After taking the requisite time to get one's head around the allegations made and sordid details shared, it didn't take much of a genius to guess what was coming next in that press conference.", "But what seemed sudden to them\u00a0would have been anything but for Paine.", "In the four years since the messages were sent, and the three and a half since Cricket Australia investigated them, it is not unreasonable to assume Paine might have had some panicked thoughts that this day might come.", "", "
Tim Paine did not take questions from the media, instead reading a prepared statement.(ABC News: Luke Bowden)
", "And if it did, he would have known then just as much as he knew today \u2014 that his position as captain of the Australian cricket team was untenable.", "The details of what has actually happened here are still being meted out through hasty press conferences, somewhat defiant statements from governing bodies and media leaks, but we know enough now to put together a timeline of events.", "We know that in November 2017, Paine sent a series of sexually explicit messages to a Cricket Tasmania staff member, including at least one graphic image.", "Paine played out the summer as Australia won the Ashes, then joined the team on the ill-fated tour of South Africa that culminated in the cheating scandal of Cape Town.", "As Steve Smith, David Warner and Cameron Bancroft fell on their sandpapered swords, Paine was the default and yet seemingly perfect choice to become the new Test captain and face of Australian cricket's new era.", "He was a cleanskin, all at once still the blond-haired wonderkid that first broke through and now the battle-weary veteran who pulled himself up by the bootstraps to earn a second chance.", "And while the world collapsed around it and decisions were made for the expressed purpose of cultural reform, that was the image Cricket Australia put forward.", "", "
Paine captained Australia when it retained the Ashes in England in 2019.(Getty Images/Visionhaus)
", "Three months later, in June 2018, Cricket Australia and Cricket Tasmania were made aware of the allegations by way of a complaint from the woman in question.", "The fact that Paine was married with a five-month-old baby at the time of the messages\u00a0clearly deepens the problem, but isn't what would have sparked the investigation.", "Paine was initially accused of sending unsolicited pictures of his genitals \u2014\u00a0which is by definition sexual harassment. But those allegations were dismissed when subsequent investigations found, as Cricket Tasmania put it today, that the interaction was \"consensual, private, occurred on the one occasion only, was between mature adults and was not repeated\".", "Both investigations from Cricket Australia and Cricket Tasmania found Paine did not breach any codes of conduct.", "Once Paine was cleared, it appears the matter was to be one for the Cricket Australia filing cabinet \u2014 that is until elements of the media were made aware of the incident and were prepared to reveal its salacious details.", "Which brings us to today, and the many questions that remain outstanding.", "Some of those questions surround the sequence of events that have unfolded today, the digging up and releasing of private messages that were found not to be in breach of any codes of conduct after what we are obliged to assume was a thorough investigative process.", "", "
Tim Paine was overcome with emotion during Friday's media conference.(ABC Hobart: Luke Bowden)
", "But the greatest questions are around what happened in June 2018, just a small handful of months after the sandpaper debacle and with Australian cricket at its lowest ebb.", "At that point, Cricket Australia faced a fork in the road.", "They could, in the name of complete transparency and making a statement of positive cultural intent, reveal publicly there was\u00a0an investigation unfolding into the behaviour of the new Test captain and wear the inevitable blowback for the greater good.", "Or they could say nothing. They could proceed with their public-facing organisational cleansing and hope this nasty business would stay behind closed doors forever.", "It's not hard to see why they made the second choice. But it does little to engender confidence that this Cricket Australia is any different from the one it had apparently dismantled and left behind.", "There are no indications there will be any further investigation into the allegations made by the Cricket Tasmania employee, and Cricket Australia has said Paine remains available for selection for the first Test in Brisbane on December 8.", "The Australian Cricketers' Association said it was \"saddened\" that Paine had felt the need to resign, and said his standing down reflected \"the esteem in which he held the role\".", "Perhaps we all shouldn't be so shocked the next time a sudden Friday afternoon press conference is called."]
